name: SKY CUBE: INFINITE
description:
Sky Cube: Infinite is a fun and challenging game!

Hold right or left part of the screen to turn. Swipe up to jump.
Repeat until you become a TOP 1!
Tip : To do Hyper Jump use 3 fingers on the sides.

Features:
◉ Cool looking graphics
◉ Fancy controls
◉ Global scoreboard
◉ Customizable cube
◉ Changing difficulty

Sky Cube: Infinite is made for anyone and completely FREE to play!
Download now and show everyone who is the best!

Background Music :
 "Landscape" by Jarico
(Vlog No Copyright Music)

Sound Effects:
